title: Mandelbrot Set Renderer
description:
A simple renderer for the Mandelbrot set.
Warning: Takes a long time to load.

title: Industrial Revolution
description: A factory building game and automation game inspired by Factorio. Made in Godot 3.5.

title: polynomial.js
description: A JavaScript library for storing polynomial expressions. Can also solve linear and quadratic equations.

title: Web Control Panel
description: A user interface with all kinds of tools, all built into a bookmarklet.

title: Depression Clicker
description: An idle game inspired by Cookie Clicker. Idea came from a friend.

title: Learn Pi
description: A tool to help learn up to 1000 digits of pi. I used this myself to learn 100 digits!

title: Desmos Expression Compiler
description: A Lisp-like programming language that compiles to LaTeX expressions used by Desmos Graphing Calculator.

title: Desmos Expression Compiler 2
description: A C-like programming language that compiles to LaTeX expressions used by Desmos Graphing Calculator. An improved version of my old Desmos Expression Compiler.

title: Logic Simulator
description: A simulator of digital logic. Made in Godot 4.2.

title: Portfolio
description: The website you're looking at right now.

title: Tristable Engine (TS Version)
description:
A JavaScript/TypeScript game engine for making simple HTML5 games using HTML5 Canvas.
Part of my "company," Tristable.

title: Tristable Engine (C++ Version, WIP)
description:
A C++ game engine for making simple games using SDL2.
Part of my "company," Tristable.
